info.description: API Server for Document Management Service
info.title: DMS API

get.description: get all data about the cars

post.description: creates and adds new data about the car
creates and adds data about the dispetcher
creates and adds data about the driver
creates and adds data about the mehanic
creates and adds data about the organization

get.description: gets data about all putlist headers

post.description: creates and adds data about the putlist

put.description: updates data about the putlist header

get.description: gets data about all putlist bodies

post.description: creates and adds data about the putlist body

put.description: updates data about the putlist body

get.description: gets data about all bank accounts

post.description: creates new data about the bank account

put.description: updates data about the bank account
